Uses of Package
org.efaps.db.databases

  • Packages that use org.efaps.db.databases 
    Package Description
    org.efaps.db
    This package contains all classes related to the eFaps-DataBase.
    org.efaps.db.databases
    Wrappers to be able to work with different Databases.
    org.efaps.db.databases.information
    Classes used to store information retrieved from the connected eFaps-Database.
  • Classes in org.efaps.db.databases used by org.efaps.db 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDatabase
    Abstract definition of database specific information and methods like alter of table columns.
  • Classes in org.efaps.db.databases used by org.efaps.db.databases 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDatabase
    Abstract definition of database specific information and methods like alter of table columns.
    AbstractDatabase.ColumnType
    The enumeration defines the known column types in the database.
    DerbyDatabase
    The class implements Apache Derby specific methods for data base access.
    MySQLDatabase
    Database class for the MySQL database.
    OracleDatabase
    The database driver is used for Oracle databases starting with version 9i.
    PostgreSQLDatabase
    Database class for the PostgreSQL database.
  • Classes in org.efaps.db.databases used by org.efaps.db.databases.information 
    Class and Description
    AbstractDatabase.ColumnType
    The enumeration defines the known column types in the database.
